sentence.Network_en: I wonder if the oculist could fit me in next Friday.
sentence.Network_cn: 不知眼科医生能否在下星期五给我安排一个时间.

sentence.Network_en: The oculist removed a foreign object from his eye.
sentence.Network_cn: 眼科医生从他眼中除去一个异物.

sentence.Network_en: If your eyes are infected, you must go to an oculist.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你的眼睛受到感染, 就要去看眼科医生.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French oculiste, from Latin oculus 'eye'

means.word_mean: 1. a person skilled in testing for defects of vision in order to prescribe corrective glasses
2. a medical doctor specializing in the treatment of diseases of the eye
